ll power(ll a,ll b,ll m)
{
	if(!b)
		return 1;
	if(b==1)
		return a;
	ll temp=power(a, b/2, m);
	temp=(temp*temp)%m;
	if(b&1)
		temp=(temp*a)%m;
	return temp;
}
class graph
{
	vi * adj;
	int time;
	public:
		graph( int v)
		{
			adj = new vi[v];
			time = 0;
		}
		void add_edge(int u, int v)
		{
			adj[u].pb( v);
			adj[v].pb( u);
		}
};
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int i, t, n, m, ans;
	ll top, bottom;
	cin >> t;
	while( t--)
	{
	    cin >> n >> m;
	    vi v(n);
	    for( i=0;i<n;i++ )
	   {
	       cin >> v[i];
	   }
	   sort(v.begin(), v.end());
	   top=bottom=0;
	   for( i=0;i<m;i++ )
	    top += v[i];
	   for( i=m;i<n;i++ )
	   {
	       bottom += v[i];
	   }
	   cout << (bottom-top) << "\n";
	}
}
